result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Breoun D. Bellinger

defendant.name: Bellinger, Breoun D.
defendant.address: c/o Matt Talbot Recovery Center, Milwaukee, WI 53218

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Breoun D. Bellinger
Current: c/o Matt Talbot Recovery Center, Milwaukee, WI 53218 United States  (Effective: 04-20-2022)
Prior: 1551 S. 35th Street  #5, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States
Order to report to MCSD for photo and prints

$500.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
--Willie Allen, 4738 N. 68th Street, Milwaukee, WI  53218.

Order Granting Defendant's Motion to Modify Bond.   
1.   The Court orders that , upon release from Manitowoc County Jail, Mr. Bellinger shall be monitored by JusticePoint Milwaukee.   
2.  Upon furnishing cash bail, Mr. Bellinger may be transported from the Manitowoc County Jail to the Matt Talbot Recovery Center by Attorney James G. McCann or a member of the treatment facility.
Motion and Order to Modify Defendant's Bond
Scheduling conference on November 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL-
Zoom appearances.
Discussion held on getting defendant into a treatment facility, monitoring costs and transport.
The Court indicates that the framework is in place, but before she can modify bail, all aspects need to be worked out.  Therefore, no modification is granted until more information is put in place.
State to draft order.
Scheduling conference is set for 11-09-22 at 10:00 a.m.
Minutes.
Bail/bond hearing on August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Letter from defendant to Judge Dietz re: bail.
Status conference on August 10, 2022 at 10:15 am.
AMENDED Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Zoom appearances.
Defendant in custody in Manitowoc County Jail.
The parties argue the motion.
The court has concerns with the defendant's lack of making appearances in court.  She is unwilling to modify bail in order to "find" a bed.  Court will order modification of bail once a bed is available.
On 21 CF 1007, the Court modifies bail to $500.00 cash.
On 22 CF 110, the Court modifies bail to $1,000.00 cash.
On 22 CF 115, the Court modifies bail to $500.00 cash.
All previous conditions will remain in effect.  The Court adds the condition that upon cash bail being posted, the defendant is to be released directly from custody into the inpatient treatment facility.  Transportation is to be done by the facility.  If no bed is available in a facility, the defendant shall not be released.
Attorney McCann to draft the appropriate order.
Minutes.
Bail/bond hearing on July 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bond.
Status conference on August 10, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Status conference on June 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on May 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Current: 1551 S. 35th Street  #5, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 04-20-2022)
Prior: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States

Order Denying Defendant's Motion.
It is hereby ordered that the defendant's Motion to modify bond is denied.

Order Denying Defendant's Motion.
It is hereby ordered that the defendant's Motion to modify bond is denied.
Scheduling conference on April 20, 2022 at 09:45 am.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL -
Attorney McCann argues for bail modification based upon his written motion filed with the Court on 02-14-2022.
State objects to any modification of bail.
Court denies the defendant's motion to modify bail.  State to draft order.
Minutes.

Defendant waives their right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
Offer deadline 03-25-2022 
Scheduling conference is set for 04-20-2022 at 09:45AM
Minutes.
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bond.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: James McCann, through Public Defender.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 02-23-22 at 3:30 p.m.    
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Breoun D. Bellinger
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 02-10-2022)
Prior: 421 N 8Th St Upper, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Re:  Possess THC, 2nd & subsequent offense, on 02-05-22.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of possess fentanyl, possess methamphetamine, possess THC, possess drug paraphernalia and 4 cts. felony bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 02-14-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 cash bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 48 hours or, if incarcerated, within 72 hours of release.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the custody of the Sheriff.  
Minutes.
